TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PersonalizationDictionary extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type PersonalizationDictionary = class interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装基本验证规则，这些规则指示是在 还是 范围内将一段自定义数据视为可个性化。

span.span: Encapsulates basic validation rules that indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in either or scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例是对象的集合 ，由个性化设置范围和对象值组成。A instance is a collection of objects, which consist of a personalization scope and an object value. 这些项在对象中分配有一个键 。These entries are assigned a key in the object. 一种很好的做法是使用方法将所有属性添加到字典 中，而不考虑页面的作用域。A good practice is to add all properties to the dictionary using the method, regardless of the scope of the page. .NET Framework 以适当的方式保存信息;例如，当页面处于范围内时，将保存共享数据 。The .NET Framework saves the information in the appropriate way; for example, shared data is saved when the page is in scope. 但是，保存 Web 部件值时，不会保存共享属性，页面处于 范围内，并且 控件是在范围内与页面一起添加的 。However, shared properties are not saved when a Web Parts value is being saved, the page is in scope, and the control was added with the page in scope.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
Web Parts Personalization Overview

related.span: 演练：使用用户控件实现 Web 部件个性化设置

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control
Web Parts Personalization

summary.span: 向个性化设置字典添加个性化设置项。

span.span: Adds personalization entries to the personalization dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以调用此方法，将各种自定义状态信息放入状态对象中，并指定与状态值关联的作用域。You can call this method, place various pieces of custom state information into the state object, and specify the scope associated with the state value. 当 控件处于范围中时 ，可以添加与 作用域或作用域相关联的名称和状态信息 。When a control is in scope, you can add name and state information that is associated with either scope or scope. 在 "作用域" 中，可以添加仅与作用域相关联的名称和状态信息 。In scope, you can add name and state information associated only with scope. 但这是一个很好的做法，即，使用包含或范围的属性将所有属性添加到字典 中，而不考虑页面的作用域。It is a good practice, however, to add all properties to the dictionary using including properties with or scope, regardless of the scope of the page. 仅当适用时，.NET Framework 才会将属性与 作用域一起保存。The .NET Framework only saves the properties with scope when appropriate. 换言之，当 页面处于范围内时，在以后保存在范围内的某个控件时，不会保存共享属性 。In other words, shared properties are not saved when a control that was initially added in scope is later saved while the page is in scope. 相反情况下，如果 控件已添加到范围中的页 上，并且在该页处于范围内时该控件随后已保存 ，则会将自定义的共享属性值连同自定义用户范围的属性一起保存 () 。In an opposite scenario, if a control was added to the page in scope, and the control is later saved while the page is in scope, custom shared property values are saved (along with custom user-scoped properties). 有关个性化设置数据以及共享和用户范围的属性如何受页面的个性化设置范围的影响的详细信息，请参阅 [Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)) 主题。For details on personalization data and how shared and user-scoped properties are affected by the personalization scope of the page, see the [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)) topic. 与任何集合一样，此方法将集合计数递增1，且集合上当前活动的所有枚举数都应失效。As with any collection, this method increments the collection count by one and any enumerators currently active on the collection should be invalidated.

summary.span: 移除所有来自当前 对象的自定义状态信息。

span.span: Removes all custom state information from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法从当前对象中清除所有自定义状态信息 。This method clears all custom state information from the current object. 对于集合，当前处于活动状态的任何枚举器都应该无效。Any enumerators currently active against the collection should be invalidated. 若要仅删除个性化设置字典中的特定个性化项，请使用 方法。To remove only a specific personalization entry in a personalization dictionary, use the method. 请注意，对空个性化设置字典调用此方法不会引发错误。Note that calling this method on an empty personalization dictionary does not raise an error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于 表示由参数标识的自定义个性化设置信息的对象 `key` 。This property works with a object representing custom personalization information that is identified by the `key` parameter. 如果没有任何值 `key` ， `null` 则返回。If there is no value for `key`, `null` is returned. 如果尚 `key` 不存在，则 `key` 会将 (及其关联值) 添加到字典中。If `key` does not already exist, then `key` (and its associated value) are added to the dictionary. 请注意，你可以向字典中添加 null 值，并且索引器还可以用于更新个性化设置值。Note that you can add a null value to the dictionary, and the indexer can also be used to update the personalization value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在内部，当你删除自定义状态条目时，个性化设置字典的计数将减少1。Internally, when you remove a custom state entry, the count of the personalization dictionary is decremented by one. 当前对字典有效的任何枚举器都应该失效。Any enumerators currently active against the dictionary should be invalidated. 如果尝试删除不存在的键，则不会发生错误。No error occurs if you attempt to remove a nonexistent key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将检查多个详细信息，以确保 `value` 和 `key` 在尝试将它们添加到个性化设置字典之前的有效性。The method checks several details to ensure the validity of `value` and `key` before attempting to add them to the personalization dictionary. 如果检查成功，则该方法将调用 类自身的 方法，并向其传递 `key` 和 `value` 参数。If the checks are successful, the method calls the class's own method, passing to it the `key` and `value` parameters.
